purpose: To enable developers to build and manage AI agents using PHP, with enhanced observability and debugging capabilities
principle: Built on PHP, leveraging Inspector.dev for monitoring, it provides a framework for developing AI agents with logging and performance tracking
reusability: Modular design allows for easy integration with existing PHP applications; supports Inspector.dev for monitoring
limitations: Limited to PHP environment; requires familiarity with Inspector.dev for full functionality
name: neuron-ai
description: Open source framework to create full featured AI Agents in PHP - powered by Inspector.dev
highlight: Framework for creating AI Agents in PHP with Inspector.dev integration for monitoring and debugging
